name: Diorama (MochaSalmon)
description:
Guide the evolution of your tiny digital HUMANs with terraforming and building tools at your disposal in this mostly 1-bit simulation sandbox game.

  • 2 eras of HUMAN history
  • Terraform the land to create new species and objects
  • Combine your powers to make new discoveries

  • Build settlements and industry to advance civilization

  • Stop your HUMANs from escaping the simulation
